Previous Season

2020-2021 SEASON

This was quite a challenging season for our team due to its virtual format because of COVID-19. However, our robot still won the Collins Aerospace Innovate Award at one of the qualifying competitions, which is an award that celebrates a team that thinks outside the box and has the ingenuity, creativity, and inventiveness to make their designs come to life. This judged award is given to the team that has the most innovative and creative robot design solution to any specific components in the FIRST Tech Challenge Both our team captains, Pragya and Mallika, were also nominated as Dean's List Semifinalists, and Mallika went on to qualify as a Dean's List Finalist. The Dean's List is an award given to great examples of student leaders who have led their Teams and communities to increased awareness for FIRST and its mission. Despite the challenges of this season, our team was still able to perform well, and we are hoping to regain our streak of Regionals in future seasons!
